long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the dark and relentless world of Guts with this intense live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A bold interface inspired by Guts’ warrior spirit, featuring deep, shadowy tones and subtle hints of steel and blood.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that mirrors Guts’ gritty, no-nonsense attitude.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into Berserk-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as powerful and relentless as Guts’ fight for survival.
